# Copilot Instructions for PR Reviews

## Review Focus Areas:
1. Code quality and best practices
2. Security vulnerabilities
3. Performance issues
4. Test coverage
5. Documentation completeness

## Specific Rules for development â†’ main:
- Must have passing tests
- Must have updated CHANGELOG
- Must follow semantic versioning
- Must not have merge conflicts
- Must include proper commit messages

## Using Copilot in PR Comments

You can manually invoke Copilot in PR comments with these examples:

```
@copilot review this PR for security issues
@copilot explain the changes in this PR
@copilot suggest improvements for this code
```

This helps get additional AI-powered insights during the review process.
